DataElement.preferredName: Person Clinical Trial Participation Assessment Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response for questions to determine clinical trial eligibility related to patient assessments in taking part in a research study as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Clinical Trial Participation Assessment Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes._The act of taking part in an activity._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A human being.:A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.

Concepts.definition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.

Property.preferredName: Participation Assessment Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria

The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The act of taking part in an activity.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient been asked to if
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient been asked to if they are willing to participate in protocol 10-C-0086 Comprehensive Omics Analysis of Pediatric Solid Tumors and Establishment of a Repository for Related Biological Studies or if has NF1, patient will be asked to co-enroll on the NF1 Natural History Study and 08-C-0079: Natural History Study and Longitudinal Assessment of Children, Adolescents, and Adults with Neurofibromatosis Type 1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have histologically or cytologically confirmed CD19+ Precursor B-acute lymphoblastic leukemia (Pre-B cell ALL) OR CD19+ mixed phenotype acute leukemia (MPAL): a) with relapse following or refractory to at least one prior line of therapy if older than 21 years; b) in second or higher relapse or refractory to at least two prior lines of therapy if 21 years old and younger (16-21); c) or has a new diagnosis of Pre-B cell ALL or CD19+ MPAL but is greater than or equal to 60 years old and is either not a candidate for or does not wish to receive traditional induction chemotherapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient been asked to if they are willing to participate in protocol 10-C-0086 Comprehensive Omics Analysis of Pediatric Solid Tumors and Establishment of a Repository for Related Biological Studies or if has NF1, has patient been asked to co-enroll on the NF1 Natural History Study and 08-C-0079: Natural History Study and Longitudinal Assessment of Children, Adolescents, and Adults with Neurofibromatosis Type 1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a known concurrent malignancy that is expected to require active treatment within two years, or may interfere with the interpretation of the efficacy and safety outcomes of this study in the opinion of the treating investigator?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Are remaining standard treatment options unlikely to be effective in the opinion of the treating physician, or patient is felt to be ineligible for such therapies or the patient refuses such therapies?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have histologically or cytologically confirmed, by local institution,  CD19+ Precursor B-acute lymphoblastic leukemia (Pre-B cell ALL) OR CD19+ mixed phenotype acute leukemia (MPAL): a) with relapse following or refractory to at least one prior line of therapy if older than 21 years; b) in second or higher relapse or refractory to at least two prior lines of therapy if 21 years old and younger (16-21); c) or has a new diagnosis of Pre-B cell ALL or CD19+ MPAL but is greater than or equal to 60 years old and is either not a candidate for or does not wish to receive traditional induction chemotherapy?
